definition: divinatory diagram/one of the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]/one of the sixty-four divinatory hexagrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)
surname Bu
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]/gossip/gossipy
to change one's mind/to go back on one's word
fortune telling
baguazhang (a form of Chinese boxing)
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
eight-trigram battle array/(fig.) mystifying tactics
Bagua Mountain, Taiwan
baguazhang (a form of Chinese boxing)
the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (I Ching or Yi Jing) 易經|易经
interpretation of the divinatory trigrams
to interpret the divinatory trigrams
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
eight trigrams furnace to cook pills of immortality/symbol of the alchemist's art/Double, double toil and trouble, Fire burn, and cauldron bubble

sentences.english: The divinatory texts are a synthesis of the meanings proposed by many experts.
sentences.chinese: 卦文是一個綜合的含義提出了許多專家。

sentences.english: The various arrangements of the 64 hexagrams can represent every possible change in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 由六十四卦排列組合，可以表達宇宙中一切的變化。

sentences.english: The abundance of human life is discussed in Shuogua.
sentences.chinese: 《說卦》主要闡述了儒家人生觀的豐富性。

sentences.english: Once they had left Key Biscayne, Rogers and Laird quickly reversed themselves.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑斯和萊爾德一離開比斯坎島，很快就變了卦。

sentences.english: The divinatory texts are a synthesis of the meanings proposed by many experts.
sentences.chinese: 卦文是一種合成的意義提出了許多專家。

sentences.english: Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them injury.
sentences.chinese: 摩脫車手闢須帶頭盔保護卦薊免受傷害。

sentences.english: In positioning the eight trigrams, it was much possible that the cyclic producing between the five elements had been taken into consideration.
sentences.chinese: 在卦位的安排中，很可能已考慮到五行的循環相生。

sentences.english: Here, we'd like to give this "Fu Gua" to every member of our audience, who are away from home.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏我們把復卦送給電視機前所有出門在外的朋友。

sentences.english: They include the name and explanation of each "Gua" (diagrammatic divinatory symbol).
It was the first time I'd won since learnt to play chess.
sentences.chinese: 卦從我學會下國妓畜棋以來，肘是我第一次贏。

sentences.english: The attribute of the hexagram is devotion; its image is the earth.
sentences.chinese: 這個卦的屬性是“奉獻”，它的表現形式是“地球”。

sentences.english: Each of the basic forms in Tai Chi Chuan has a hexagram in the "I Ching" relating to it.
sentences.chinese: 在太極拳裏的每一式都能用易經上的一個卦對應上。

sentences.english: And analysis of I Ching hexagrams remarks on the impact of body later speech.
sentences.chinese: 並分析了《易經》的卦爻辭對後世辭體產生的影響。

definition: the solid and broken lines of the eight trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], e.g. ☶
to interpret the divinatory trigrams
the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (I Ching or Yi Jing) 易經|易经
divine by stalk
to foretell the future using the trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经
good and bad luck (in astrology)
The Book of Changes ("I Ching")
to interpret the divinatory trigrams
to obey/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing wood and wind/☴/ancient Chinese compass point: 135° (southeast)
decisive
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
copulate/good
same as 天干/the 10 heavenly stems 甲, 乙, 丙, 丁, 戊, 己, 庚, 辛, 壬, 癸 (used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal number like Roman I, II, III)
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
variant of 坤[kun1]
